thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Streets of Paraty

title: Streets of Paraty
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
When you walk slowly on the cobblestone streets of Paraty, the impression one gets is that time has stopped here and gradually you will entering the city atmosphere that looks more like a movie set, the chariots through the streets, the tide when it rises, floods city streets, people, details and even drips once experienced, you buy at the time a bottle to take. The historic downtown streets were all arranged east to west and north to south. It has neither straight, to defend the city, so when there is a pirate invasion, the enemy would never know he had someone waiting at the end the route 
snunney , Noel_Byrne has marked this note useful
